title: [K-12] Split Learning and Self-Explanation Video Design Process for Scientific Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to comprehend foundational scientific concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, enhanced real-time interaction, and project-based assessment application.

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy using segmented 5-minute videos
Learners can connect video content to three or more real-world cases by applying self-explanation strategies (using questionnaires)
Learners can self-assess their conceptual understanding by writing a 500-character reflective journal after video learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
